逺字的基本解释

逺
yuǎn
古同“远”。

逺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuǎn］
［《廣韻》雲阮切，上阮，云。］
“远1”的繁体字。亦作“逺1”。
(1)遥远，距离长。
(2)漫长，时间久。
(3)多，指差距大。
(4)深远；深奥。
(5)高远；远大。
(6)偏僻之地；远方。
(7)指远邦，远国。
(8)迂远，不切近事情。
(9)扩大；扩展。
(10)指血统关系疏远。参见“遠兄弟”、“遠親”。
(11)超过；胜过。
(12)古州名。在今四川省松潘县境。
[②]［yuàn］
［《廣韻》于願切，去願，云。］
“远2”的繁体字。
(1)离开；避开。
(2)不亲近；不接近。
(3)违背。

逺字的康熙字典解释
逺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
逺字的起名意思

暂无。

逺
Basic explanation of words
逺
yuǎn
Gu Tong is "far".
逺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuǎn］
["Guangyun" Yun Ruan Qi, Shang Ruan, Yun. ]
Traditional characters for "远1". Also known as "逺1".
(1) Far away, long distance.
(2) Long, long time.
(3) Too much means that the gap is large.
(4) Profound; profound.
(5) Lofty; lofty.
(6) A remote place; far away.
(7) Refers to a distant country, a distant country.
(8) Detour, not close to things.
(9) Expand; expand.
(10) Refers to alienation of descent. See "distant brother", "distant relative".
(11) To exceed; to exceed.
(12) The name of the ancient state. In today's Songpan County, Sichuan Province.
[②]［yuàn］
["Guangyun" Yu Yuan cut, go to wish, cloud. ]
Traditional characters for "远2".
(1) Leave; avoid.
(2) Not close; not close.
(3) Violation.
